metadata.description: Refined event model for Revenue Stream Hijacking case 2025-137857

events.description: RegimaSA (Pty) Ltd incorporated as Collections Agent
events.significance: Establishment of shell company structure with no legitimate business operations

events.title: First ReZonance Invoice to RST
events.description: First invoice from ReZonance to RegimA Skin Treatments for Google GSuite services (R250.80), marking the beginning of business relationship

events.title: ReZonance Service Expansion
events.description: Major service expansion with multiple enterprise services (R100,000+), substantial increase in service provision and financial exposure
RegimaSA first financial year end (15 months) showing zero revenue, R1,589 loss, minimal activity
events.significance: Evidence of shell company with no operations; related party loans to ReZonance during debt accumulation period

events.title: Financial Year Commencement RST/SLG
events.description: Financial year commencement for RegimA Skin Treatments and Strategic Logistics, beginning of period covered by trial balance evidence

events.title: Financial Year Commencement Villa Via
events.description: Villa Via operates on different financial year, creating complexity in group reporting and enabling profit extraction concealment

events.title: Adderory Company Registration and Stock Supply Arrangement
events.description: Adderory company registration and stock supply arrangement with RegimA (potential fictitious supplier)
events.impact: Potential creation of fictitious or controlled supplier to manipulate revenue recognition

events.title: Multiple Adjusting Journal Entries
events.description: Significant inter-company cost reallocations: RWW R500K stock provision write-back, RWW R810K admin fee reallocation, SLG R252K admin fee reallocation, SLG R80K production cost transfer to RST
Multiple adjusting journal entries across entities for inter-company cost reallocations
events.additional_notes: RWW R500K stock provision write-back, RWW R810K admin fee reallocation, SLG R252K admin fee reallocation, SLG R80K production cost transfer to RST

events.title: Year-End Adjustments and Interest Payment
events.description: SLG pays R414,334.09 interest to RST per loan agreement, RST advances R750K loan to RWW for production costs, Directors' fee adjustment R784K in RST
SLG pays R414,334.09 interest to RST per loan agreement
events.additional_notes: Year-end adjustment showing established inter-company loan structure

events.title: Bantjies R18.685M Debt to Faucitt Family Trust
events.description: Documentation of Bantjies's R18,685,000 debt to Faucitt Family Trust, creating massive conflict of interest
events.impact: Creates motive for Bantjies to prevent fraud discovery, dismiss audit requests, and support retaliatory legal action

events.title: Villa Via Year-End Profit Extraction
events.description: Villa Via generates R4.4M monthly rental income with R3.7M profit, Members loan account R22.8M indicating systematic capital extraction
Villa Via financial year-end showing R3.7M profit and R22.8M members loan
events.additional_notes: Monthly rental income R4.4M, net profit R3.7M, members loan account R22.8M indicates significant capital extraction

events.title: Bantjies Trial Balance Email Distribution
events.description: Email from Danie Bantjies with final trial balances to Bernadine Wright, Jax, Peter, Rynette, Daniel for financial statement finalization meeting
Bantjies sends trial balance email to finalize financial statements
events.additional_notes: Email from Danie Bantjies to Bernadine Wright, Jacqui, Peter, Rynette, and Daniel with final trial balances for financial statement finalization meeting

events.title: Bantjies Sends Trial Balance Email to Bernadine Wright
events.description: Bantjies sends trial balance email to Bernadine Wright for financial statement finalization meeting, demonstrating his control over financial systems and accounting records

events.title: Rynette Farrar Demonstrates Sage System Control
events.description: Screenshot evidence shows Rynette with control of Sage accounting system and access to Pete@regima.com email
events.impact: Direct proof of technical capability to manipulate financial records through system-level access

events.title: SARS Tax Audit Notification
events.description: SARS notifies RegimA companies of tax audit, providing independent regulatory scrutiny
events.impact: Independent third-party verification of financial irregularities

events.title: Adderory Companies Registration - Pre-Planning Phase
events.description: Rynette's son registered Adderory (Pty) Ltd and Adderory Skin (Pty) Ltd, establishing competing business infrastructure 4 years before fraud escalation. Demonstrates long-term conspiracy planning.
events.additional_notes: Registered April 2021, 4 years before May 2025 fraud escalation, demonstrates systematic pre-planning

events.title: Kayla Pretorius Estate Documentation
events.description: Estate documentation for Kayla Pretorius, whose email account later became subject to court-ordered seizure

events.title: Court Order for Kayla Pretorius Email Account Seizure
events.description: Court orders seizure of Kayla Pretorius email account for evidence of fraudulent activities
events.impact: Court-ordered seizure indicates judicial recognition of potential incriminating communications

events.title: ReZonance Opening Balance Debt
events.description: Opening balance showing substantial accumulated debt to ReZonance (R971,587.93), evidence of unpaid services over extended period

events.title: First Structured Payment to ReZonance
events.description: First structured payment to ReZonance (R40,000), attempt to manage debt through partial payments
RegimA WWD paid R157k+ to ReZonance, reducing debt from R85k to R22k (July-December 2022)
events.significance: Large debt payments during pre-fraud period; debt reduction suggests legitimate business relationship or settlement strategy

events.title: Kayla Pretorius Murder
events.description: Murder of Kayla Pretorius, creating estate complications, law enforcement investigation, and family trauma. Estate includes ReZonance debt of R1,035,000.
events.additional_notes: Account access complications, law enforcement investigation ongoing, referenced in criminal case documentation

events.title: ReZonance Final Balance Persistent Debt
events.description: Final balance showing persistent debt to ReZonance (R1,035,361.34) despite payment claims, debt continues to grow

events.title: False Payment Claim #1 to ReZonance
events.description: RegimA claims payment of R470,000 to ReZonance not reflected in ReZonance records, first documented false payment claim

events.title: False Payment Claim #2 to ReZonance
events.description: Additional false payment claims totaling R765,361.34 to ReZonance, escalation of fraudulent payment claims

events.title: Chantal Letter - Kayla Estate Finalization
events.description: Chantal delivered letter mentioning Kayla estate finalization, indicating ongoing exploitation of deceased victim's estate.
events.additional_notes: Estate finalization timing correlates with revenue hijacking timeline, suggests coordination

events.title: Chantal Delivers Letter About Kayla Estate Finalization
events.description: Chantal delivers letter to office regarding Kayla estate finalization, indicating ongoing exploitation of deceased victim's estate

events.title: R900,000 Unauthorized Transfers from RegimA SA
events.description: Peter made unauthorized transfers of R900,000 from RegimA SA without Daniel's authority as co-director

events.title: R5.2M SLG Stock Missing & Large Invoice
events.description: R5.2M SLG stock missing with simultaneous R5.2M invoice from SLG to RST. Stock physically disappeared, same type later supplied by Adderory to RegimA. Systematic asset stripping begins.
events.additional_notes: Same stock type supplied by Adderory (Rynette's son), demonstrates coordinated transfer pricing fraud

events.title: RegimA SA Revenue Diversion Started
events.description: Diversion of revenue streams from RegimA SA initiated, marking the beginning of systematic revenue hijacking

events.title: R5.4M Stock Disappears from Strategic Logistics
events.description: R5.4M worth of stock physically disappears from Strategic Logistics warehouse. Represents 46% of annual sales, 10x historical adjustment rate. Same stock type later supplied by Adderory (Rynette's son's company) to RegimA.

events.title: Trust Structure Establishment
events.description: Foundation for R2.85M+ trust violations established through trust structure manipulation
events.crime_type: Fraudulent trust establishment, fiduciary duty violations

events.title: R5.4M Stock Adjustment Processed Without Investigation
events.description: R5.4M written off as simple 'stock adjustment' without investigation, supporting documentation, or proper authorization. Bantjies as accountant should have investigated 46% loss but did not, demonstrating complicity.
events.crime_type: Fraudulent trust establishment, fiduciary duty violations

events.title: Two Years Unallocated Expenses Dumped
events.description: Rynette and Peter dumped two years' worth of unallocated expenses from all companies into RegimA Worldwide and pressured Daniel to sign off within 12 hours for SARS VAT & Annual Accounts. Daniel used time until June 6th to finalize reports and uncover fraud.
events.additional_notes: Occurred while accounts system controlled by Rynette using Peter's email, despite Linda being employed as bookkeeper

events.title: Payment Redirection Scheme
events.description: Part of R4.28M+ financial diversions. Payments redirected from platform owned/paid by RegimA Zone Ltd (UK)

shopify_connection.note: Payments redirected from platform owned and paid for by RegimA Zone Ltd (UK)
shopify_connection.revelation: Customer payments were for sales on a Shopify platform continuously funded by Dan's UK company, not RWD ZA

events.title: Bank Account Change Letter for RegimA Worldwide
events.description: Setup for R3.14M+ revenue theft. First documented act in coordinated scheme. Attempted redirect of payments from Dan's UK-funded infrastructure

shopify_connection.note: Bank changes targeted revenue from Shopify platform paid by Dan's UK company
shopify_connection.revelation: Attempted to redirect payments for sales on infrastructure owned and paid by RegimA Zone Ltd

events.crime_type: Fraudulent redirection of funds, theft by conversion

events.title: Cloud IT Systems Removal Order
events.description: Peter ordered Cloud IT systems removal, seizing infrastructure control from legitimate operators.
events.additional_notes: Infrastructure control seizure between bank letter (Apr 14) and audit trail destruction (May 22)

events.title: Peter Orders Cloud IT Systems Removal
events.description: Peter instructs removal of all cloud IT systems, systematic dismantling of cloud-based infrastructure as preparation for evidence destruction

events.title: Server Missing from Office
events.description: Physical server hardware disappears from office premises, potential evidence destruction or data harvesting in preparation for subsequent financial crimes

events.title: Unauthorized Beneficiary Changes
events.description: Exclusion of legitimate beneficiaries. Direct violation of trust obligations and beneficiary rights
events.crime_type: Trust deed violations, unauthorized beneficiary amendments

events.title: Jacqui Confronts Rynette About R1,035,000 Debt
events.description: Jacqui confronted Rynette regarding R1,035,000 owed by RegimA Skin Treatments to Rezonance since Feb 2023. Jacqui stated these funds were part of Kayla's estate and keeping them would be profiting from proceeds of murder.
events.additional_notes: Debt is actually misallocated payments in accounts, not true debt

shopify_connection.note: Transfers included revenue from Shopify platform funded by RegimA Zone Ltd
shopify_connection.revelation: R850K+ transferred included revenue from platform paid by Dan's UK company over 28 months

events.title: Unauthorized Transfers (R850K+)
events.description: R850,000+ unauthorized transfers. Direct evidence of financial authority abuse and theft. R850K+ included revenue from platform paid by UK company (28 months)

shopify_connection.revelation: R850K+ transferred included revenue from platform paid by Dan's UK company over 28 months

shopify_connection.revelation: R850K+ transferred included revenue from platform paid by Dan's UK company over 28 months

events.title: Shopify Audit Trail Hijacking
events.description: CRITICAL EVENT: R1M+ monthly revenue → R0 (100% business shutdown). Central evidence destruction event proving consciousness of guilt. Destruction of audit trails for platform owned, paid, operated by RegimA Zone Ltd (UK) since July 2023 - proves RWD ZA has no independent revenue stream. Orders removed from Shopify following Jacqui's confrontation.

shopify_connection.note: CRITICAL: Audit trail destroyed for platform continuously paid by Dan & Jax UK company (RegimA Zone Ltd) - evidence that RWD ZA has no independent revenue stream
shopify_connection.revelation: Destruction of audit trails for platform owned, paid for, and operated by RegimA Zone Ltd (UK) since July 2023, proving RWD ZA generated no independent revenue

events.crime_type: Evidence destruction, computer fraud, business sabotage

events.title: Domain Registration (Identity Fraud)
events.description: Customer hijacking platform. Family conspiracy escalation and digital impersonation. Domain registered to impersonate business on Dan's UK-funded platform. New domain regimaskin.co.za registered by Adderory (Rynette's son's company) following Shopify shutdown.

shopify_connection.note: Domain registered to impersonate platform owned by RegimA Zone Ltd (UK)
shopify_connection.revelation: Identity fraud to impersonate legitimate business operating on Dan's UK-funded infrastructure

events.title: Daniel Finalizes Fraud Reports
events.description: Daniel finalized reports uncovering fraud after using time from March 30 deadline extension

events.title: Daniel Sends Comprehensive Reports to Bantjies
events.description: Daniel sends comprehensive documentation to Bantjies including listing of all companies, Shopify store operations, and preliminary reports, demonstrating full transparency

events.title: Secret Card Cancellations
events.description: Secret cancellation of cards to sabotage Daniel's ability to pay creditors. Rynette may have opened 8 ABSA accounts using Daniel's stolen card.

events.title: Bantjies Dismisses Audit Request
events.description: CRITICAL EVENT: Bantjies dismisses Daniel's audit request 4 days after Daniel exposed Villa Via fraud. Audit would have discovered R5.4M stock adjustment fraud and systematic inter-company manipulation. Demonstrates consciousness of guilt and protection of fraud scheme.

events.title: Bantjies Dismisses Audit Request
events.description: Bantjies dismisses Daniel's audit request 4 days after fraud exposure (June 6), demonstrating consciousness of guilt and conflict of interest given R18.685M debt to trust
events.additional_notes: Bantjies had R18.685M reasons to prevent audit, which would discover debt and conflicts

events.description: Bantjies dismisses Daniel's audit request 4 days after fraud exposure
events.additional_notes: Bantjies dismisses audit with 'I am going away for 2 weeks' on June 10, 2025, just 4 days after Daniel provided comprehensive reports exposing fraud on June 6, 2025

events.title: Bantjies Learns of Criminal Matters
events.description: Daniel reports to Bantjies about Kayla's murder (August 2023) and Peter stealing funds after murder, including over R1.8M owed to Rezonance. Bantjies acquires knowledge of criminal matters before signing confirmatory affidavit.
Bantjes email confirms R10M bank balance decline year-on-year; first-ever substantial trading loss in RegimA Group history
events.significance: Massive financial deterioration acknowledged by accountant; Bantjes dismisses detailed audit despite acknowledging losses
evidence: Email: The RegimA Group results and Computer Expense analysis (2025-06-10)
key_statements: 30-odd year involvement with the Faucitt family business
R10m decline year-on-year for the Group, including Villa Via
First time in history made a substantial trading loss
Computer expenses in excess of 20% of revenue

Email control facilitated fraud related to platform paid by Dan's UK company since July 2023. Email from Gee in Aug explained to Jax that she was instructed to send out 'don't use regima.zone only use regimaskin.co.za email'.

Bantjies certifies Peter's affidavit as Commissioner of Oaths despite material omissions

events.title: Accounts Emptied
events.description: Accounts emptied, potentially because Daniel was still managing to pay creditors despite 6 months of sabotage

events.description: Attorney letter demanding R60.25M revenue + $150K platform fees, total ~R63M, 48-hour deadline (ignored)

legal_implications: Shows bad faith by ignoring formal demand

events.description: Original RegimA business entity formed as Close Corporation. Peter Faucitt as founding member.

events.description: RegimA Worldwide Distribution acquired as shelf company (formerly Clear Creek Trading 139). Attorney Christian Gouws resigned same day - indicating pre-arranged shelf company transfer.
events.additional_notes: Resignation date (2011-03-10) before registration date (2011-03-11) indicates shelf company transfer

events.title: Strategic Logistics Ownership Restructure
events.description: Jacqueline and Peter Faucitt added as 33% members each to Strategic Logistics CC, changing the ownership structure.

events.title: Daniel's 2017 Company Formation Spree
events.description: Daniel James Faucitt registered multiple companies in April-May 2017: ReZonance, RegimA Medic, RegimA Zone Academy, RegimA SA, RegimA Zone, RegimA SpaZone.
events.significance: Establishes Daniel's independent business development efforts

events.title: ALOECO Registration with Shared Address
events.description: ALOECO (SA) registered by Alan Peter Louw and Martin Carlo Rizzotto. Directors use PO Box 9477 Edenglen - same postal address area as Faucitt companies (PO Box 9523 Edenglen).
events.significance: Potential business connection requiring investigation

events.significance: Shelf company later transferred to Daniel Faucitt and Kayla Pretorius

events.title: FFT Receives Ketoni Share Certificate #3
events.description: Faucitt Family Trust receives Share Certificate #3 for 5,000 A-Ordinary shares in Ketoni Investment Holdings. This establishes the ZAR 18.75M entitlement (May 2026 payout option).
events.significance: CRITICAL - Central financial motive for all subsequent actions

events.title: Kayla Pretorius Death - 80 Days After Ketoni Investment
events.description: Kayla Pretorius dies 80 days after FFT's Ketoni investment. This death triggers estate proceedings and potential asset appropriation opportunity.
events.significance: CRITICAL - Trigger event for appropriation scheme
evidence: SF7 - Court Order Kayla Email Seizure

events.title: Bantjies Joins The George Group as CFO
events.description: Daniel Jacobus Bantjies joins The George Group as CFO, one month after FFT receives Ketoni share certificate. Kevin Derrick (Ketoni Director) is also a director at The George Group.
events.significance: CRITICAL - Establishes Bantjies-Derrick-Ketoni connection

events.title: RegimA SA Revenue Diversion Begins
events.description: Diversion of revenue from RegimA SA begins, marking the start of systematic revenue stream hijacking.
events.significance: CRITICAL: First documented revenue diversion event in the sabotage timeline.

events.title: Rynette Bank Letter for RegimA Worldwide Diversion
events.description: Rynette sends bank letter to divert RegimA Worldwide funds, escalating the revenue hijacking scheme.
events.significance: CRITICAL: Documentary evidence of intentional fund diversion.

events.title: Orders Removed from Shopify Platform
events.description: Orders systematically removed from Shopify platform, disrupting business operations and revenue tracking.
events.significance: CRITICAL: Evidence of deliberate business sabotage.

events.title: Secret Card Cancellations
events.description: Bank cards secretly cancelled less than 24 hours after Daniel exposed Villa Via fraud to Bantjies.
events.significance: CRITICAL: Demonstrates consciousness of guilt and retaliation for fraud exposure.

events.title: Jacqui Confronts Rynette About R1,035,000 Debt
events.description: Jacqui confronts Rynette regarding ZAR 1,035,000 owed by RegimA Skin Treatments to Rezonance since Feb 2023. Jacqui stated these funds were part of Kayla's estate.
events.significance: CRITICAL: Trigger event for subsequent retaliation (Shopify removal, domain registration).

events.title: Adderory Registers regimaskin.co.za Domain
events.description: New domain regimaskin.co.za registered by Adderory (Rynette's son's company) following Shopify shutdown, enabling customer hijacking.
events.significance: CRITICAL: Evidence of premeditated customer diversion scheme.

events.title: Company Accounts Emptied
events.description: All company accounts emptied, potentially because Daniel was still managing to pay creditors despite 6 months of sabotage.
events.significance: CRITICAL: Final act of financial sabotage.

events.title: Ketoni Investment Holdings Incorporation
events.description: Ketoni Investment Holdings (Pty) Ltd incorporated, establishing the entity that would later owe ZAR 18.75M to FFT.
events.significance: CRITICAL: Establishes the corporate vehicle for the central financial motive.

events.title: FFT Invests in Ketoni - ZAR 18.75M Entitlement Established
events.description: Faucitt Family Trust invests in Ketoni Investment Holdings, receiving Share Certificate #3 for 5,000 A-Ordinary shares. This establishes the ZAR 18.75M payout entitlement due May 2026.
events.significance: CRITICAL: Establishes the central financial motive for all subsequent events.

events.title: Bantjies Appointed FFT Trustee by Rynette
events.description: Daniel Jacobus Bantjies appointed as Trustee of Faucitt Family Trust by Rynette, T-10 months before Ketoni payout. Strategic appointment to consolidate trust control.
events.significance: CRITICAL: Strategic trustee appointment aligned with Ketoni payout timeline.

events.title: Settlement Agreement Signed - Main Trustee Power Backdated
events.description: Settlement agreement signed with Jacqui's cooperation. Main Trustee power backdated, occurring T-9 months before Ketoni payout.
events.significance: CRITICAL: Consolidation of trust control before payout.

events.title: Peter Files Interdict - Jax & Dan Betrayal
events.description: Peter files interdict in family court (not commercial court), 48 hours after settlement signing. Forum shopping to control beneficiaries' shares of Ketoni payout.
events.significance: CRITICAL: Forum shopping to maximize control over trust assets.

events.title: Ian Levitt R63M Formal Demand Letter
events.description: Ian Levitt Attorneys sends formal demand letter for R63M, which is subsequently ignored by Peter and legal team.
events.significance: HIGH: Evidence of substantial financial exposure being ignored.
